title: I think I am experiencing a Phishing attack
content:
I have been getting messages to up date Thunderbird. The first 3 were last week, and appeared to be in Chinese. Today I started to keep the update messages in English. So I went the the thunderbird update release channel and downloaded the latest release. But, I am still getting notifications to update thunderbird. I rechecked the release channel and am using the current version.

So anybody know what is going on?
creator: bhammerberg

title: Messages will not open after clicking them in Win-10 notification area.
content:
Greetings,

New incoming message alerts show up in the Win-10’s notification area, as usual, & as expected. But clicking on the message notification clears the message from the notification area instead of opening the message in Thunderbird (as it used to), ever since updating to v115.0.1 (64-bit).

Thanks, Greg
creator: gks8mail+firefox

title: Attachments not showing on top of other windows
content:
Up until recently when I clicked on an attached image, whether in a message I'm composing or one I've received, the image would open and immediately be visible on the screen. For some reason now when I click on the image (.jpg, .png, etc) it opens to the taskbar but I have to click on it to see it.

Does anyone know what might be causing this? For whatever reason it doesn't happen with other files types, such as .xls or .pdf. Those still open on top of TB. Only images that open with Photos (I'm using Windows 10) stay behind TB. I'm not seeing anything in the settings (either for Photos or TB) that would determine which window shows on top. Anyway suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
creator: manmachine78

title: DELETED THUNDERBIRD APP BY MISTAKE - URGENT (please...)
content: I use a MacBook Pro v. 10.15.7 (Catalina), and I live in the UK. I am going to upgrade my old MacBook Pro to a MB Air, and my Time Machine has stopped working. While researching a solution I found that perhaps there was not enough space on my HD to 'create a snapshot'. So in the process of deleting stuff in order to make space, I found lots of 'duplicates' in the Apps Storage section of the HD, I thought it was safe to delete them as the 'originals' would still be there (same date, same size). I now know I have been very ignorant/stupid (my dog died a few weeks ago and my mental health hasn't been the same since.) However, I was very mistaken and seem to have deleted a lot of my working apps, the most important of which being Thunderbird, which gathered my 4 different email accounts. I'm not sure what version I had last, as it has disappeared, but I'm pretty sure it would be the latest version. My latest download is 68.2.2 (20.11.19). So I tried to reinstall it, but came across this notification 'You have launched an older version of Thunderbird... Create new profile, or Quit.' I googled this but being a not-very-techy senior lady, I can't make sense of what I should do, my main concern being not to lose all my settings, my emails saved in folders, as well as being able to receive and send. I am sure I saw some reference in the past of a library which would contain the emails, but don't know what to do about this notification. The other problem, of course is that I can't completely rely on Time Machine as my last backup is dated 24.7.23. Thank goodness today is a Sunday as there should be less traffic on my email accounts (I am involved with lots of local activities, including being a community journalist). I would be so grateful if someone could help me navigate this minefield and reinstate my app so it works as closely as it did before. Many thanks in advance for your help and patience.
creator: gfinley

title: Thunderbird (115.0.1) not completing SMTP protocol fails to send Quit after 250 Ok from server
content:
I have just upgraded to Thunderbird 115.0.1 and e-mail are not being sent. On investigation Thunderbird is not sending 'Quit' after receiving the '250 Ok' from the SMTP server. Thunderbird thinks the exchange is complete but the socket is still open and the SMTP server is hanging waiting for the 'Quit' response. I have turned on the SMTP debug in Thunderbird and I have captured a typical interaction:

Trying to load /usr/lib/thunderbird/libotr.so OTRLib.sys.mjs:65:11 Successfully loaded OTR library /usr/lib/thunderbird/libotr.so OTRLib.sys.mjs:73:13 mailnews.smtp: Sending message <b0371ddc-d1f6-ed22-41b3-42277ac627eb@ntlworld.com> SmtpService.jsm:88:18 mailnews.smtp: Connecting to smtp://eric:25 SmtpClient.jsm:123:19 mailnews.smtp: Connected SmtpClient.jsm:387:17 mailnews.smtp: S: 220 Eric SMTP Server Ready

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: C: EHLO [192.168.0.2] SmtpClient.jsm:591:19 mailnews.smtp: S: 250-Eric offers TWO extensions:

250-SIZE 512000000

250 HELP

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: Possible auth methods: SmtpClient.jsm:878:17 mailnews.smtp: C: MAIL FROM:<me_name@ntlworld.com> SIZE=2939 SmtpClient.jsm:591:19 mailnews.smtp: S: 250 OK

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: MAIL FROM successful, proceeding with 1 recipients SmtpClient.jsm:1135:17 mailnews.smtp: Adding recipient... SmtpClient.jsm:1140:17 mailnews.smtp: C: RCPT TO:<me.m.name.SF@gmail.com> SmtpClient.jsm:591:19 mailnews.smtp: S: 250 OK

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: RCPT TO done, proceeding with payload SmtpClient.jsm:1200:19 mailnews.smtp: C: DATA SmtpClient.jsm:591:19 mailnews.smtp: S: 354 End data with <CR><LF>.<CR><LF>

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: Sending 2939 bytes of payload SmtpClient.jsm:559:17 mailnews.smtp: S: 250 OK

SmtpClient.jsm:416:17 mailnews.smtp: Message sent successfully. SmtpClient.jsm:1259:21

Any suggestions has to what is wrong ? Thanks
creator: smf.forum1

title: Missing my Local Folder sub-folders and emails
content:
My laptop recently crashed and as a result of this I had to uninstall Thunderbird as when I tried to open it, it told me that another session was already open and I need to close the first one before I could reopen the application. However I was not able to view the opened session, nor close it, hence why I uninstalled Thunderbird and downloaded a new version. The new version has been successfully apart from I am not able to see my emails stored in the Local Folder. I have located these on my drive but not sure how to reconnect them, plus not all the folders are showing.

I have attached images as follows: 1. Shows Thunderbird view with server folders and emails and nothing in the Local folders 2. Shows my Server Message Storage directory 3. Local Folder Message storage directory 4. Profiles found on my PC - Under C:\Users\myname\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles there are 2 profiles 5. My real profile mail local folder view - This has my Local Folders in the Inbox.sbd but not all are shown as folders, others are File or MSF File. Filepath is C:\Users\myname\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\a6jo5zdd.default\Mail\Local Folders 6. Profile InBox data - 7. The other Profile Inbox data view which doesnt include any of my local folders and data 

I have attached pcs and would appreciate any assistance to reinstate my Local Folders data so that I can see it. Thanks.
creator: Rosalie.Connarty

title: Issues with Thunderbird 115.0.1 (64-bit) closing and starting W10
content:
Today I went to close Thunderbird using File>Exit. It does not close, and I see the the "Emptied Trash" message. If I go to click on "File" again there is often no dropdown. If I go to close it using the "X" it closes. When I try start it again it will not start. I have to go to the task manager where I find instances of it running, and close them...then it will start. When it is started, I can close it using the X and it starts normally. All extensions are disabled.

Very occasionally Thunderbird will close using File>Exit but will not start normally.

Any ideas?
creator: scottsan

title: new ISP and wondering how to set up email
content:
I have used Thunderbird for 12+ years. Now that we have AT&T as our new ISP, I have learned that AT&T doesn't provide an email address. I had no idea and I am frustrated. I also have Gmail, but I am not happy about trying to merge my large Gmail file with my 17 GB Thunderbird file. I worry about losing emails from years ago saved in Thunderbird and in Eudora before that! I assumed I would get an AT&T email and go on as before. Now what?

I suppose it wouldn't be the end of the world to use Gmail all the time. I hate its filing system which is why I want to keep using Thunderbird. I worry as both files are large. Can I really merge all this stuff and not lose my old emails?
creator: EastTenn

title: How to send OpenPGP encrypted email contents as binary instead of ASCII armor
content: I noticed that using OpenPGP encryption in Thunderbird results in the encrypted email content to be ASCII armored. How do I configure Thunderbird to produce binary PGP instead of ASCII armored PGP? An OpenPGP encrypted file in binary format is smaller than one in armored format (i.e. text format).
creator: condif

title: Messaggi cancellati dopo lettura
content: Buongiorno a tutti, sono nuovo del gruppo ma utilizzo da molto tempo Thunderbird. Ho un problema su alcune cartelle in cui smisto i messaggi. Capita che quando leggo il messaggio (attendo che il messaggio torni a carattere normale ed il contatore di messaggi non letti venga decrementato) ed esco dalla sottocartella, quando rientro nella stessa sottocartella il messaggio è scomparso e non si trova neanche nel cestino. Altre sottocartelle sotto la stessa cartella invece non presentano questo problema e conservano correttamente i messaggi. Ho controllato le proprietà di conservazione dei messaggi e sono uguali per tutte le sottocartelle ma alcune si comportano correttamente ed altre cancellano i messaggi letti all'uscita dalla sottocartella. Suggerimenti? Grazie Carlo
creator: gn.carlo

title: Filtri non funzionanti
content: Buon giorno a tutti, sono nuovo del gruppo anche se utilizzo Thunderbird da un decennio. Da un pò di tempo non vengono applicati i filtri in fase di ricezione dei messaggi. Se li forzo dal menu strumenti-> esegui i filtri nella cartella selezionata (posta in arrivo), i filtri funzionano correttamente. Preciso che hanno sempre funzionato ed anche che, attualmente (in rare occasioni), funzionano correttamente durante lo scaricamento. Ho sempre utilizzato IMAP e l'account su cui si verifica è YAHOO. Sotto lo stesso rpofilo c'è anche un account ALICE su cui i filtri funzionano correttamente. Avete suggerimenti? Grazie per l'attenzione Carlo
creator: gn.carlo
